      • isAuthorizedToCreateNewNameSpace

        public boolean isAuthorizedToCreateNewNameSpace()
        Returns:
        true if the admin has access to the empty namespace (and hence is allowed to create new ones)

      • getNameSpaceAvailable

        Returns:
